name: Reality Check (Kozmic Studios)
description:
Reality Check is a puzzle-story game based on how we perceive life and how others might too. Covering topics such as solipsism, the game makes you question both your life and others.

Credits: 

Programming, Art, Music - Connor (connor#0008) 

Game Design - Seth (Seth-#0920) 

Writing - Aaron (aaron g#7471)

Controls:

Movement WASD Interact Z Skip Text X
